name: Swirl
description: These one-of-a-kind slippers are laid back with just a subtle astetic touch. Embrace the swirl and bring a little attention, but not too much attention to your feet. All of our slippers are naturally-dyed and hand-felted with high-quality sheep's wool and feature a durable leather bottom.
alt: Hand-felted Wool Valley Slippers made in Peru. Model: Swirl
